reviewText: This DVD was horrible. I also failed to realize that this DVD was only ten minutes long and sadly, I paid over ten dollars for it. Luckily, I have been to Vegas before so I know what vegas has to offer, but for someone who has never been, this DVD offers no insight to Las Vegas and only shows a glimpse of a few of the hotels on the Las Vegas strip. (I could have put together a better DVD than this one)!

the video certainly is not worth a dollar a minute.  shame on me for not noticing the video only ran 10 mins.  there was some good information in it if you wanted a quick overview, but was disappointed that it only covered about 6 casino hotels.

Modern Times Wonders LAS VEGAS STRIP If you have not been to vegas and you are going for the very first time, this tape will give you what i call an inside view of what some of the hotels look like on the outside, with a brief description of those hotels. Word of note: the Rollercoster on the Stratsphere is nolonger there, but the big shot still is along with two new rides, one is named sanity and the other I don't remember at this moment. Both are not for the faint of heart.
